goal: Recognize and name uppercase and lowercase letters
Identify sounds that letters make (e.g., “A is for apple”)
Begin to write or trace their own name
Count aloud to 10–20, match numbers with objects
achievable: Use toys and snacks for practice.

goal: Identify common shapes: circle, square, triangle
Listen to a story and answer questions
specific: Read aloud and ask simple questions.
measurable: Track answers with a sticker chart.
